validateSendTo() validateSendToNotificationTarget NotificationTargetvalidateSendTo
validateSendTo ( $event, array $infos, $notify_me = false , $emitter = null )
Validate send before doing it (may be overloaded : exemple for private tasks or followups)
Depuis
0.84 (new parameter)
Paramètres
string$event
notification event
array$infos
destination of the notification
boolean$notify_me
notify me on my action ? ($infos contains users_id to check if the target is me) (false by default)
mixed$emitter
if this action is executed by the cron, we can supply the id of the user (or the email if this is an anonymous user with no account) who triggered the event so it can be used instead of getLoginUserID
Renvoie
boolean
